notes.text:
My final version of my Dark world deck. 

The first version consisted 4-starred ladybug as a tech against Dino, GB, Aliens, fishes or any level 4 beaters (I ran 1 copy of cheerful coffin on this version)

Afterwards, I experimented with 21 card deck by adding additional copy of Broww and cheerful coffin, and omitting 4-starred ladybug. The reason for cutting down 4-starred ladybug on this version was that most of my matches were not 80% against Aliens and fish decks anymore.This time, the deck worked but it became bricky shortly after. 

Lastly, I had to cut down my 2nd broww, then I  got myself to KOG smoothly with this build   I got rejected many times on KOG promo matches, but I had to keep believing in the name of Grapha.
